main event: Mr. Paul Brannon and his family observed a walnut-shaped object emerging from behind a cloud and leaving a vapor trail in the sky.
interesting points: The object was visible for less than one minute but left a 'tube of light' visible for about 15 minutes., Mr. Brannon took four exposures of the 'tube of light' during the event., The sighting occurred on 16 January 1949 while Mr. Brannon was driving towards Paris, Kentucky., Fellow observers included Mr. Brannon's wife and niece, who also witnessed the event., Witnesses described the object as dark and referred to its shape as both bullet-shaped and resembling a milled walnut.
sighted object: a walnut-shaped object trailing a vapor trail
witness description: Mr. Paul Brannon, a publisher, accompanied by his wife and niece.
